title: Density Estimation With Gaussian Mixture Models
description: In this lab, we will use the scikit-learn library to generate a Gaussian mixture dataset. We will then fit a Gaussian Mixture Model (GMM) to the dataset and plot the density estimation of the mixture of Gaussians. GMMs can be used to model and estimate the probability distribution of a dataset.

meta.title: Density Estimation With Gaussian Mixture Models
meta.description: Learn how to use Gaussian Mixture Models for density estimation and probability distribution modeling.
meta.keywords: density estimation, gaussian mixture models, probability distribution, machine learning, data analysis
